game.name: Cowboys vs Robots
game.description:
Do you love playing action based games for boys? Join Cowboys Vs Robots and get ready to be a part of an action packed game where there will be no shortage for the back to back fighting challenges! This war is not common since the participants are not the human beings on both sides. But here is a clash between a powerful cowboy and a horde of deadly robots. This cowboy is heavily armed, but looks quite puzzle on how to deal with these blood-thirsty souls. 
Give this free online shooting game a try right away and allow yourself to take the commands over a cowboy who is ready to go on this epic defence battle of his life! These dangerous robots will keep coming in different waves in different stages. Try to challenge your shooting skill to get him through multiple levels that will become tougher and tougher! It does not look as difficult as you thought of. Show off your ultimate reflexes to destroy all enemies in this html5 shooter game! 
Make sure to give your 100 percent effort to get all 3 stars and hit your best score in the scoreboard. Use arrows or pistols to kill all your enemies and clear all levels. The major characteristics of this cute cowboy defense game are 300 stars to collect, 100 levels, best scores and touch the screen to fire. This cowboy will be happy if you help him out during the tough situation of his life i.e. a robot invasion. Now it is in your hands how to bring a huge smile on his face.
